vehicles.description: In the middle of the intersection, there is an industrial crane in operation, partially extending across the road, with a large concrete structure hanging above, positioned over the ongoing road construction.
vehicles.explanation: Due to the crane occupying part of the road and conducting operations, it requires the main vehicle to maintain a safe distance and may need to stop or take a detour depending on the available space and the ongoing construction instructions.

vehicles.description: On the right side of the frame, a white car can be seen partially exposed and distant from our vehicle, not interfering with its path of travel.
vehicles.explanation: Its existence is acknowledged for situational awareness, but does not immediately impact the driving decisions of autonomous vehicles.

vulnerable_road_users.description: The construction personnel, wearing high-visibility clothing, are walking on foot near the crane operation area of the closed road section.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: The presence of construction workers on the road requires drivers to exercise extra caution, comply with any temporary traffic directions, and be prepared to stop if necessary for their safety.

traffic lights.description: The traffic light, as seen from the perspective of the main vehicle, displays a red light, signaling the vehicle to stop.
traffic lights.explanation: The lead vehicle must come to a complete stop at the signal and may proceed only after the light turns green.

barriers.description: Temporary yellow and black barriers have closed off a section of the road, indicating ongoing construction, signaling that the road is closed or detours are in effect.
barriers.explanation: These barriers are set up to protect the construction area and guide traffic, requiring vehicles to stop or take a designated detour route.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the given traffic image, an industrial crane is operating in the middle of the intersection, extending over the road with a large concrete structure. This requires the main vehicle to maintain a safe distance and possibly stop or take a detour due to the road construction. Additionally, a white car is partially visible on the right side but does not interfere with the main vehicle's path, only serving for situational awareness.

Near the crane operation area on the closed road section, construction personnel in high-visibility clothing are walking on foot. This requires the driver to exercise extra caution, follow temporary traffic directions, and be prepared to stop to ensure the workers' safety.

The traffic light ahead displays a red light, signaling the main vehicle to stop and wait until the light turns green.

Temporary yellow and black barriers are closing off a section of the road due to construction, indicating that part of the road is closed and that detours are in effect. These barriers protect the construction area and guide traffic, necessitating that vehicles either stop or take the designated detour.

driving_suggestion: Due to the red light being on and active road construction, the vehicle must come to a complete stop at the traffic light and remain stationary until the light turns green or as directed by construction personnel or additional traffic signs. The vehicle should also be prepared to follow any detour routes or traffic control provided by the construction workers to navigate around construction equipment and workers on the road. Considering the wet and slippery road conditions, speed should be reduced to accommodate the slick surface and narrowed lanes due to construction obstacles and cones.
